title: Reach Out
subtitle: Let's build something amazing together
metaDescription: Get in touch with Harrison Callahan to discuss your next project. Available for new opportunities and collaborations.

introduction.title: Ready to Ship?
introduction.content:
I build digital solutions that work. No fancy buzzwords, no over-engineering. Just solid code that solves real problems.

Currently available for new projects.

contactForm.title: Contact Form
contactForm.description: Tell me about your project, timeline, and what you're looking for. I'll get back to you with how I can help bring your vision to life.
